name: Berbere Chicken
description: Berbere (pronounced “bear-ber-ay”) is an Ethiopian spice that packs a serious punch. It’s earthy, fragrant, and HOT! Can’t take the heat? Use a little less seasoning, or add some honey or sugar to the marinade to mellow it out.
preparation:
1. In a bowl, toss chicken with oil and seasoning. If you have time, let marinate for 30 min or overnight in the fridge. 
  2. Preheat grill to medium-high. 
  3. Place chicken on grill. Cook, with lid closed, 6–7 min per side, or until chicken is cooked through.
  4. Transfer to a cutting board. Let cool slightly, then slice and serve.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup cooked grains, your choice, and 2 tbsp leafy greens with 1 tbsp Epicure Dressing.
